name: pg-swag
description: A distributed scheduler with a grin.

scripts.build:win32: rm -rf dist && rollup index.js --file dist/cjs/index.js --format cjs --exports named && rollup index.js --file dist/esm/index.js --format esm && echo { "type": "module" } > dist/esm/package.json && echo { "type": "commonjs" } > dist/cjs/package.json && cd dist && exitzero standard --fix */*.js && tsc ../index.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly --target ESNext --module NodeNext --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:default: rm -rf dist && rollup index.js --file dist/cjs/index.js --format cjs --exports named && rollup index.js --file dist/esm/index.js --format esm && echo '{ "type": "module" }' > dist/esm/package.json && echo '{ "type": "commonjs" }' > dist/cjs/package.json && cd dist && exitzero standard --fix */*.js && tsc ../index.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly --target ESNext --module NodeNext --skipLibCheck
